name: heavy-industry
author: Eipusino
subtitle: Heavy Industry Java Mod
description:
Content expansion mod based on vanilla. It can also be used as a hidden mod that does not load content and only serves as a pre development library, providing various tools and methods.


The cover is a cute strawberry cake!

基于原版的内容拓展mod。 也可以作为隐藏mod不加载内容仅作为开发前置库，提供多种工具和方法。以及对json和js便利的api支持。

该模组可能会对部分包含js的模组导致冲突。


封面是可爱的草莓小蛋糕！
